top_themes: Current futures lows amid crop forecasts

query_results.top_post: @katy_merrifield ENOUGH with the misinformation!!! Prices for coffee have gone up around the entire planet ! The Arabica futures, the global benchmark to measure the price coffee, went up 70-100% in the last year! ... (anniedufour99)

payload.summary: The Federal Reserve delivered a surprise hawkish pivot following the release of the January FOMC minutes on February 18, 2026, and a 'hot' Core PCE inflation print on February 20. Minutes revealed officials are considering potential rate hikes if inflation remains sticky, while the PCE data (0.4% MoM) exceeded expectations, signaling that 3% inflation is becoming entrenched.
payload.market_impact: Bullish for the US Dollar as the DXY rebounded; heavily bearish for commodities and risk assets, with Gold and Silver experiencing sharp liquidations and Treasury yields spiking on 'higher-for-longer' expectations.
